title: Revenue Recognition and Forecasting UI
description:
Create Comprehensive Revenue Dashboard with Financial Analytics

Build a complete revenue dashboard that provides real-time financial insights including accrual tracking, forecasting visualizations, and cash flow projections.

Requirements:

Accrual Tracking:
- Display current accrued revenue with breakdown by category/source
- Show accrual timeline with historical trends
- Track accrual vs. actual revenue reconciliation
- Provide filtering by date range, department, or revenue stream
- Highlight discrepancies or anomalies requiring attention

Forecasting Charts:
- Implement interactive revenue forecast visualizations (line charts, bar charts)
- Support multiple forecasting models (linear, seasonal, custom)
- Display confidence intervals or prediction ranges
- Allow comparison of forecasted vs. actual revenue
- Enable time period selection (monthly, quarterly, yearly views)

Cash Flow Projections:
- Visualize projected cash inflows and outflows
- Calculate and display net cash position over time
- Include scenarios for best case, expected, and worst case projections
- Show runway or burn rate metrics if applicable
- Highlight critical cash flow events or milestones

Technical Considerations:
- Ensure data refreshes automatically or on-demand
- Implement responsive design for desktop and tablet viewing
- Optimize performance for large datasets
- Add export functionality (PDF, CSV, Excel)
- Include proper error handling for data fetch failures
- Implement role-based access controls if needed

Data Integration:
- Connect to revenue data sources (database, API, accounting system)
- Validate data accuracy and completeness
- Handle missing or incomplete data gracefully
- Ensure calculations are auditable and transparent
